thread.title: Street Microsurfacing in Joplin -
thread.title_full: Street Microsurfacing in Joplin - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: News Release
title: Street Microsurfacing in Joplin -
text:
JOPLIN, MISSOURI - Friday, October, 9, 2015, Vance Brothers will be microsurfacing in the following area:
Pearl Ave – 44th t0 42nd Joplin Ave – 44th to 41st Kentucky Ave – 41st to 44th Missouri Ave – 29th to 41st Moffet Ave – 35th to 32nd Ruby Ave – 34th to 36th Saturday, October 10, 2015, Vance Brothers will be microsurfacing in the following area:
Stone Ridge – Grand to Cul-de-sac 34th Street – Indiana to Cul-de-sac Sergeant Ave – 44th to Pearl Virginia Ave – 41st to End Pearl Ave – 32nd to End
Monday, October 12, 2015, Vance Brothers will be microsurfacing in the following area:
Sergeant Ave – 35th to 33rd Oak Ridge – 32nd to End Hearnes Frontage Road – 35th to 36th 37th Street – Virginia to Kentucky Kentucky Ave – 37th to End 43rd Street – Pearl to Hearnes
Lane closures and traffic delays may occur.
Work in this area will be from 7:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M.
Drivers may wish to utilize alternate routes during this period.
If you have any questions, please call Vance Brothers, Brian Weaver, 1-819-9637.
